properties.entry: SELECT menu_code , menu_name , menu_price , category_name , IF(orderable_status = 'Y', '주문가능', '주문불가') AS orderable_status FROM tbl_menu m LEFT JOIN tbl_category c ON c.category_code = m.category_code ORDER BY menu_code DESC
SELECT category_code , category_name , ref_category_code FROM tbl_category
INSERT INTO tbl_menu ( menu_name , menu_price , category_code , orderable_status ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE tbl_menu SET menu_name = ? , menu_price = ? , category_code = ? , orderable_status = ? WHERE menu_code = ?
